price: 63. Yalli sheytan kee kaa katattem meesiisak: koo kee Aadam samadak koo katatteeh ku yab toobbeemik gexa sin galto jahannam girak, tokkel diggah jahannam girah digaala koo kee keenih inkih galtoy dudda Íe kinnik kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: قَالَ ٱذۡهَبۡ فَمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ جَزَآؤُكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ مَّوۡفُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla idh'hab faman tabiʿaka min'hum fa-inna jahannama jazāukum jazāan mawfūran
